Name: B & T
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Delicately spiced and slightly sweetened tequila.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2007 by Neyah White, San Francisco, USA. Originally this consisted of equal parts served unchilled in a brandy glass and using anejo tequila.
Nutrition: One serving of B & T contains 230 calories
